pages.title: Fey Altar
pages.text: With the right ingredients and incantation written on a summoning scroll with magic ink, you can summon back a Fey. The summoning ritual requires a Fey Altar, which can be crafted or can be found at a World Tree.

pages.title: Mandrake Seed
pages.text: A Mandrake Seed can be found in the Fey trees. As a normal tree is corrupted by the fey's magic some seeds will turn into a mandrake seed.
